summary: This is an email from a forensic psychologist at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York, dated July 28, 2019, identifying the two inmates involved in an incident as Nicholas Tartaglione and Jeffrey Epstein. It appears to be official communication regarding an incident at the prison.

persons.name: Nicholas Tartaglione
persons.context: Identified as one of the two inmates involved in an incident at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, with prisoner number 78514-054.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Identified as one of the two inmates involved in an incident at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, with prisoner number 76318-054.

connections.description: Both were inmates at the Metropolitan Correctional Center and were involved in the same incident referenced in the email.

events.title: Incident at Metropolitan Correctional Center
events.description: An unspecified incident occurred at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York involving inmates Nicholas Tartaglione and Jeffrey Epstein.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, 150 Park Row, New York, New York 10007
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein was an inmate at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York with prisoner number 76318-054.
Nicholas Tartaglione was also an inmate at the same facility with prisoner number 78514-054.
An incident occurred involving both Epstein and Tartaglione, prompting official communication from a forensic psychologist.
The document is dated July 28, 2019, which is shortly before Epstein's death on August 10, 2019.
The email is marked as containing sensitive information and is intended for official use only.
